name: Safavieh_Odessa_Grey_Bookcase
reviews: The grey was perfect for my kids. Easiest piece of furniture I've assembled!
Easy to assemble, sturdy. Exactly what I needed in the guest room!

I needed a narrow bookcase for the end of my cabinets for my cookbooks and cast iron pans and this sturdy little item worked perfectly. The color is a nice light slate. It's sturdy, easy to put together and works in traditional, transitional or contemporary decor. I'm very pleased.
description: The versatile Odessa bookcase glides from country cottage to transitional rooms with ease. Its traditional spindle style frame holds four shelves ready to deck out with books or curios. Pine wood with a sleek grey painted finish updates the look.Color: GreyMaterials: Pine, MDF, wood veneerFinish: GreyDimensions: 66.75 inches high x 23.5 inches wide x 15.75 inches deepThis product will ship to you in 1 box.StyleCountryMaterialMDF, Pine, Veneer, WoodFinishPaintedShelf TypeBookshelvesAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorGrey
